headline: U.S. Strike in Iraq Kills Commander Of Iranian Force
abstract: Suleimani was planning attacks on Americans across the region, leading to an airstrike in Baghdad, the Pentagon statement said. Iran’s supreme leader called for vengeance.
lead_paragraph: WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. — Iran’s top security and intelligence commander was killed early Friday in a drone strike at Baghdad International Airport that was authorized by President Trump, American officials said.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
